Overview
IO_Digital_IO002App

Overview

IO002 App can be used by top level Apps to consume and configure a digital pin resource. The App provides a Virtual Signal which allows connectivity to top level Apps. If IO002 App is consumed directly by top level App, the signal connectivity is done internally, and solver allocates the appropriate Port Pin. Based on the connectivity, the pin is configured either in input mode or output mode. The DaveSupport App generates the pin multiplexor settings based on signal connectivity.

The user can assign the port pin manually also as shown in the diagram below using "Manual pin assignment" toolbar item in DAVE3.
